Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System - Tetracycline (0.0625-16 µg/mL) EY
BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System Tetracycline (0.0625-16 µg/mL) - Streptococcus ID/AST or AST only Phoenix Panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully automated short-term incubation cycle antimicrobial susceptibility system
Specimen Type(s): Pure culture of Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria
Pure culture of Gram-positive bacteria (Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, Streptococcus)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System panels for tetracycline (0.0625-16 µg/mL) antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Streptococcus species.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for rapid identification and quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by MIC of aerobic and facultative anaerobic Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria, including Streptococcus species, using tetracycline at 0.0625-16 µg/mL on ID/AST or AST only Phoenix panels.
